Text: Work Around Design Document for Providing As we discussed at the recent RMS meeting TXU is wanting to move forward with a contingency plan to provide the meter read data to REPs in the event that ERCOT is unable to pass them on The attached document describes how we propose to accomplish this I will be available for questions at Wednesdays RMS meeting See attached file Workaroundppt Workaroundppt

Contingency Plans for RMS MeetingEarlier today I sent copies of TXUs proposed contingency plan for your review We will be prepared to discuss this proposal at the RMS workshop on Thursday We will also be prepared to discuss TXUs contingency plans for the conversion Unfortunately we may not be able to send out copies for your review prior to the meeting If that is the case I will bring copies with me to the meeting
